reviews.title: Great Hub
reviews.review_text: I bought this hub in order to connect a new laptop to a larger monitor. It was very easy to set up. It gives me a lot more versatility when using my laptop in that I will have multiple screens. I highly recommend this hub.

reviews.title: Great hub for limited spaces
reviews.review_text: It works great. My only gripe is it doesn't have a button to turn my computer on, so I have to open my laptop lid and press it's on/off button. If it had a power button it would be perfect, and better then the big bulky docks.

reviews.title: Possibly 4 but 3 monitors
reviews.review_text: This universal multiport was everything I needed for using with my work laptop at home. I could actually have up to 4 monitors if I count the laptop screen as one them. But I actually get 3 monitors this USB-C multiport connection!

reviews.title: Wonderful docking station!
reviews.review_text: Works great and allows for pass through charging. It requires a 90w USB power supply (sold separately). The docking station worked as soon as I plugged it in.

reviews.title: Quality Universal Hub Expensive
reviews.review_text: Universal hub works with 13” 2022 MacBook Pro M2 with Ethernet and backup drive plugged into one of two USB-A 3.2 port and no need for Apple charging adapter. In addition a HDMI port, Tx Display port are also available. Note: a 90W USB Type-C AC charger is required for hub to work. Hub plus charger are rather expensive.

reviews.title: No Power Adapter
reviews.review_text: Overall it works great but a power adapter was not included. I ordered it separately so I wouldn't drain my laptop when using the dock.

reviews.title: Not complete system
reviews.review_text: Was sold as a two-monitor and hub set. However it did not come complete. Monitors equipped with hdmi cables but hub only takes one hdmi. Had to purchase an additional display port cable to make it work.

reviews.title: Executive Assistant to the Chairman & CEO
reviews.review_text: This item did not come with a power cord and did not state that. We had to purchase after receipt. Then it did not work with the laptop we purchased at the same time.

reviews.title: USB-C Multiport Hub but it does not have power
reviews.review_text: This is a hub with all the connections I needed but there was one thing a bit frustrating -- It does not come with a power cable. It is just the hub. Keep this in mind when you purchase it.

reviews.title: Great product!
reviews.review_text: This hub is perfect for my wife's laptop! She can easily doc and use the ultra wide monitor in her office at home. It's super easy to setup and undock to take her work on the road!

reviews.title: Works great, Perfect for home office
reviews.review_text: This dock worked great for supplementing my home office in a hybrid work environment. Much cheaper than the company provided dock but with similar/equivalent functionality. No need to carry my work provided dock from home to office any more!

reviews.title: For this price they ought to have USB adapters.
reviews.review_text: If you get this for your desktop, and your desktop doesn't have a USB C port, and HP doesn't have USB C (female) to usb (male) adapter, you have a totally useless multi port. Overpriced to boot.

reviews.title: Does not always work properly
reviews.review_text: It's great when it's working properly. (Using an HP laptop) Have noticed some issues. 1. Left hub connected when laptop went to sleep. Turned it on the next morning and got a frozen screen. Had to restart. Haven't had this issue with my computer before, but it only happened once. 2. When I plug the hub into my computer, it does not always connect. Or when I start my computer, it does not always connect. The only fix is just unplugging and plugging back in until it works.

reviews.title: Unfortunately not what I needed
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately it just doesn't have enough ports for what is needed. I have a camera, a mouse, a keyboard, speakers, monitor, and a laptop. So while I use this, I also have many more wires and cords that are also plugged into my laptop, which is not what I was hoping. I really wanted to be able to disconnect and connect my laptop to this hub and be done with it.

reviews.title: HP monitor doesnt work with my HP docking station
reviews.review_text: I bought the docking station to have less things to plug into my laptop. I can't get my HP monitor to work from the HP docking station. Now I have one more thing to plug in. I already had a hub, so the docking station is a complete waste of money.

reviews.title: Power hungry docking station
reviews.review_text: Power hungry docking station uses so much power it doesn't allow enough power to charge the laptop when using HP recommended 65 watt power supply. It's also a docking station with no headphone jack, limiting the connections to the devices I enjoy using on my desk.

reviews.title: Power port doesn't work and HDMI port isn't secure enough.
reviews.review_text: It works okay. Unfortunately the power port doesn't work so I still have to have a separate power cord plugged into my laptop to keep it charged. Also, the HDMI port is a little loose so my monitor screen goes black every now and then. Very annoying.

reviews.title: Great quality. Number of ports good enough for my home office.
reviews.review_text: Great product. Compact but with the ports I need to enable my home office. There are other products with more ports online but seems also with very short life, or even dangerous for the product connected, according to user reviews. I prefer to stay with this to make sure it is compatible 100% with my HP laptop. Product quality looks great. Hope this is the case in the coming years. If not, I will update.

reviews.title: Great, unless you use an ethernet connection?
reviews.review_text: I am direct wired in with my internet, so i thought this adapter would be a great way to use the hp laptop i just bought woth my home internet - but now im always dropping off zoom calls, "network quality low", and having the prompts to restart my adapter. Pretty bummed, did i just receive a fauly one?? Because seems kinda expensice for what i got. If this is not a common issue id like to get a replacement....

reviews.title: Works Well to Connect a Monitor and Charge Laptop
reviews.review_text: Bought this hub to be able to charge and connect a large monitor at the same time. Having the USB ports allows me to connect my keyboard and mouse. I use another USB port to charge my earbuds and fitness watch too. Realize that you will need to use your own power adapter. The one that came with my HP Spectra 360 works.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.review_text: This hub is great. Easy to use and pretty self explanatory.

reviews.title: Works perfectly
reviews.review_text: Easy to set up. Works better than the dock.

reviews.title: EASY TO INSTALL, WORKS GREAT, VETSATILE AND SMART!!!
reviews.review_text: EVEN I COULD DO IT!!!

reviews.title: USB-C Multi-Port Hub A Bust
reviews.review_text: No current driver or software... Hub is recongized using a 2006 driver and that's it. Nothing. Nada

reviews.title: A handy way to keep peripherals connected
reviews.review_text: Handy way to keep your peripherals connected to the hub and just have one cable to connect to the laptop. I also purchased a HP 65w power supply to power the hub. So far, so good.

reviews.title: No Power
reviews.review_text: Product comes without an ac adapter and I wasn't aware until I received product. It is written very small underneath a picture on the website. This should be highlighted and offer an option to purchase such an adapter.

reviews.title: Not Much Benefit
reviews.review_text: Laptop still requires laptop power cord in addition to docking station cord. I had expected that the docking station would have a power button, but it does not.

reviews.title: Wish it had more HDMI ports
reviews.review_text: Wish it had two HDMI ports instead of one, but I was able to hook up my dual monitor to my laptop and that was the goal. I just have to plug one monitor into the hub and the other into the laptop

reviews.title: Not as advertised.
reviews.review_text: I was told specifically that this device would allow me to connect another monitor using the HDMI port on my HP laptop. Because of the type of USB-C port that my laptop has, it needed this hub to be able to use the HDMI port. It doesn't work!

reviews.title: Display ports not performing ugh
reviews.review_text: Trying to use two monitors off this hub. Dp port and hdmi port. Cannot use both as onevwill only shiw a monitor with 800×600 but my monitor is a full uhd.

reviews.title: Disappointing expensive product
reviews.review_text: Truly disappointing product. It does not reliably and consistency work. This should have been an easy plug and play and that is not what it is. Frankly I don't know whether this thing will ever work for me. An expensive waste of money.

reviews.title: Additional Ports for external hard drive, disc player, and thumb drives, access at the same time.
reviews.review_text: I have multiple external devices that I use, and the universal port permits me to go back and forth between them without having to unplug a device to have access to a port.

reviews.title: Docking station for monitors that is missing one HDMI slot
reviews.review_text: Docking station has only one HDMI port with two HDMI monitors. Kind of hard to use unless have adapter, which I had to purchase in order to make this work.

reviews.title: Universal USB-C Multiport Hub
reviews.review_text: Usted a very practical devine, because we have five functions in just one port! It's light weight makes it easy to carry in a little bag. Wonderful and useful, thanks.

reviews.title: Great product
reviews.review_text: Excellent quality with a lot of expansion

reviews.title: Good product; Bad for Laptop Battery
reviews.review_text: Item has some great capabilities, however it is ruining the battery life of the laptop

reviews.title: HP docking station
reviews.review_text: Works great. Turns laptop into a functioning desktop so we could add two monitors. Makes a great work from home/telework solution.

reviews.title: Poor instruction on use and lack of total package
reviews.review_text: No instructions on how to use or need to purchase additional products to connect from laptop to screen

reviews.title: Does not work as it says it does.
reviews.review_text: It doesn't seem to be working correctly, I will have to try it on a few other things. I tried to order a power supply and it doesn't work as well.

reviews.title: Incompatibility
reviews.review_text: Not universally compatible as the description states. I have an ho laptop and it does not work with it

reviews.title: buggy for external monitor
reviews.review_text: buggy for external monitor. if my omen laptop goes into power save the monitor doesn't get recognized again most of the time

reviews.title: I Don't Believe This
reviews.review_text: I did not realize I would have to purchase a power cord to use the device. Without power, no matter how great the features, I don't know yet.

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: Very disappointed! The HDMI port doesn't work and I cant even get any support to troubleshoot the problem.

reviews.title: A good supplement to have
reviews.review_text: I have not used this yet as I just got my laptop and the accessories. But it looks as if it will provide versatility in how I use my laptop. I have to do powerpoint presentations and must connect to HDMI

reviews.title: Good Multiport Hub and Size
reviews.review_text: I bought the multiport hub and it works nicely with my computer.

reviews.title: Display ports may not work
reviews.review_text: USB ports work fine. Having issues with display ports and HDMI port.

reviews.title: Multiple device connectivity
reviews.review_text: As mentioned in the description it's doesn't support to the windows laptop

reviews.title: Not UNIVERSAL
reviews.review_text: It doesn't work with my laptop. I don't understand why. Very frustrating.

reviews.title: HP HUB
reviews.review_text: Works perfectly with my laptop; connecting my laptop to my monitors and headset.

reviews.title: Easy to install
reviews.review_text: Works great! Enabled me to use a 2nd display.

reviews.title: Best universal hub
reviews.review_text: This item was a must for me, I need it to hook up my monitor and laptop at the same time.

reviews.title: Great Quality
reviews.review_text: It works great to extend the ports on my laptop. HP all the way!

reviews.title: Useful But Drains Computer Battery
reviews.review_text: Useful But Drains Computer Battery

reviews.title: Too expensive for too little
reviews.review_text: Not a good hub. Doesn't support display over USB-C for the price point which is funny

reviews.title: Hub
reviews.review_text: Works well with all of my devices to allow use of multiple devices.

reviews.title: Excellent universal dock
reviews.review_text: Works flawless with all necessary ports

reviews.title: Ports not working
reviews.review_text: Hdmi will not work with my tv/monitor??

reviews.title: Decieved
reviews.review_text: Nice product over-priced when you include the power supply

reviews.title: port replicator
reviews.review_text: Decent port replicator. Would like to see 2 HDMI ports

reviews.title: There are enough ports for laptop conection
reviews.review_text: It's a good item to have for c-uses

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.review_text: Easy to use and works nicely. IMO a little overpriced but still worth it.

reviews.title: Best Multiport Hub
reviews.review_text: This is an awesome multiport hub. I highly recommend this item.

reviews.title: Do not by with Omen 16-xxx
reviews.review_text: DV and HDMI went dead in 24 hours. No fix.

reviews.title: USB C Multiport adapter w power pass thru
reviews.review_text: This is terrific, at a reasonable price

reviews.title: Love a good docking hub
reviews.review_text: Love the convenience of docking station

reviews.title: Must have for your laptop
reviews.review_text: Must have if you need more than two USB ports or two external monitors

reviews.title: So stupid!
reviews.review_text: Bought two HP monitors, and was going to use this item. You have to buy a special adapter to use one of the two monitor ports.

reviews.title: Feels extremely cheap and not many functionality
reviews.review_text: Not worth 10 at all

reviews.title: HP Hub
reviews.review_text: The cable is useless - not a usb - what's the point?
